data.title: Top notch coney restaurant
data.text: Good quick lunches, but great for breakfast.  The full lot most mornings will give you a hint about the food and prices!  Excellent omelettes at reasonable prices, quick, and good coffee too.  Lots of workers from nearby establishments are here for breakfast and lunch.  Take the hint!  :-)

data.title: Always get a great meal
data.text:
I always get a good meal here.  It doesn't matter if it is breakfast, for coney burger and fries, it is always good.  

Great service and fast.  I love their breakfast offerings.  Lots on the menu. Very affordable for dining alone or with a family.

data.title: Decent Coney Island
data.text: Phoenix Coney Island is your standard Coney Island.  Hard to screw up coney and chili fries.  Their Grande breakfast is good and plenty of food.  The PM servers are very nice and do a great job.

data.title: Love this place
data.text: Never disappointed eating here. Price is right, food great, service excellent and no matter what time or day we come here. Great location and plenty of parking. I've been to a lot of Coney Islands and this has always been my favorite

data.title: Love this place
data.text: This place is a small place where you can get fast service. The food is very affordable and it tastes great. If your looking for a quick taste of Americana, look no further!

data.title: Cheap eats - good
data.text: Typical Michigan coney island/grill.  breakfast served all day.  Good specials.  Fast service and food comes quickly

data.title: Great place for breakfast or lunch in a hurry or not
data.text:
I have been going here for years and love the place, very basic place with good service and great food. The wait staff know what they are doing and the cooks know their stuff. 
I have never had a bad experience in this restaurant. The food is fresh and fast the coney's are great breakfast is great. All around good place to eat.

data.title: Diner style breakfast
data.text: Stopped at this coney island on a whim the other morning for breakfast.  It's unique in that all the tables are set up around the cooking area like an extension of the counter.  I had the silver dollar pancakes and gyro meat with coffee.  All were very good and the service was quick and friendly.  I would definitely recommend having breakfast here any time.

data.title: Mrs Rogo
data.text:
G5's Big BeefBurger is so good, we
will be back! All the burgers are Certified Angus Beef brand "Prime" beef. Adam Beattie is the store manager, the Best in the Business.

data.title: The best
data.text: My favorite coney island in all of metro Detroit.  The food here is priced well and is absolutely delicious.  I make sure to stop here every time I'm in town.

data.title: Good Food, Reasonable prices and good service. As good or better than any place in the area.
data.text: Menu has a good variety of food. Most of the Coney Places around Detroit are operated by Greek families. So they have Greek foods on the menu. I go there for the Coney dogs. They can be ordered with about 5 different kinds of hot dogs, from all beef to the local favorites. The chili sauce is very good. So if you have a craving for a good chili dog, this is as good as any including the two located in Downtown Detroit

data.title: Breakfast once a week.
data.text: We, the guys at work, have been getting take out breakfast once a week for many years.  It's a $4 meal that satisfies.  Always good, and cooked to order.  Fast and friendly service too.  Many varieties to your breakfast also, just ask.   It's close to work, so we call in the order, usually 6 of us, and it's ready in 15 minutes.   Good food and a good value.

data.title: Great Burgers
data.text:
The G5 Big Beef Burger is one great burger,
 One-Pound of Certified Angus Beef brand
 "PRiME" beef. One word Awesomeness!

data.title: It is a dive
data.text: Not one of the best.  Menu is good if you are in for a coney dog.  A very unprofessional run restaurant.  We only stopped in because of the rating being pretty high. We should have realized when we only saw one other car in the parking lot.

data.title: Always consistant and quick service.
data.text: You can always count on a consistent menu for years. The prices haven't gone up too much and the help is friendly. For a quick breakfast or lunch stop this is my place to go.

data.title: Fast & tasty value
data.text:
Quick meal before work. Arrived 2pm. It was fairly empty. We sat at a table that was definitely not made for large size people. The counter would have been a better choice. I ordered reuben 6.75  and fries 1.75. Companion had breakfast platter 7.00. Included 2 eggs over easy, perfect, 2 toast, 2 pancakes, perfect and served with melted butter, 2 sausages, 2 bacon, and hash browns, all very good. 
Reuben was good but not deli style . Fries were good. 
Clean and fast. A good value, and tasty. 4 stars for meeting expectations.

data.title: Perfect for Diner-Lovers
data.text:
Extensive menu, great prices, perfect atmosphere. 

I've been spending too much time with bottomless coffees at the Phoenix Coney Island since I was in high school. Every time I come back to MI, I make a point to stop by for breakfast, no matter what time it is, and long conversations with several coffee refills. 

I happen to love diners, so I really liked the old look of the restaurant with ads on placemats and coffee mugs, but I suspect their recent renovation will appeal to even more people. On my most recent visit I was even able to buy one of their fancy new mugs for $5 to take back with me to my new home to always keep a little reminder of this great restaurant near me.

data.title: Nice breakfast
data.text: Went here with a friend for breakfast.  The food was very good, and the price was excellent!  I would definitely come back here for breakfast, may have to try them for lunch or dinner :)

data.title: Awesome food at a great price
data.text:
We stopped while on our trip in michigan, and I planned on getting a coney until I looked at the menu and was in awe at the breakfast menu and the price
I had la grande and it had it all 4 eggs lots of meat and hash browns with small pancakes all for $7 you can't beat that anywhere
One of the best breakfast I've had in done time well worth the stop

data.title: Decent food, decent prices
data.text:
This is a decent family style restaurant.  Nothing to crow about, but nothing to complain about either.  They cooked my hamburg just the way I wanted it.

The only thing that I can think to mention is that the cheese on the cheese fries was not completely melted.
